long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DevTool: Backend Troubleshooter for SAP Fiori Apps

Target users:
This extension is targeted towards backend developers who would like to see more technical information from a Fiori App.

Purpose:
This simplifies the troubleshooting process for backend developers and reduces debugging time by allowing access to technical information which are usually hidden from business users.

Features:
- Statutory Reporting Data Preview app is currently supported.
    > users can see the GUID's, report ID's etc (technical information) of the document being previewed
    > users can see the schema elements and their visibility status 
- Support for more apps will be added overtime.

What's New in version 0.0.2:
- Added support for *.corp host

What's New in version 0.0.3:
- Added support for URL's with ? parameters
